article_title: Moncton fire chief overseeing pandemic response goes into self-isolation
article_description: Moncton s fire chief  in charge of the city s emergency response to the coronavirus pandemic  has gone into self isolation after learning he was among 70 people aboard a WestJet flight with a Prince Edward Island woman who tested positive
article_content: Moncton s fire chief  in charge of the city s emergency response to the coronavirus pandemic  has gone into self isolation after learning he was among 70 people aboard a WestJet flight with a Prince Edward Island woman who tested positive Isabelle LeBlanc   1884 chars
